title: Chicken soup with cabbage
ingredients: ['1 whole chicken', '2 carrots', '2 sticks celery', '1 leek', '1 large parsnip', '1/2 onion', '2 bay leaves', '5 juniper berries', '10 black peppercorns', '1 teaspoon salt', '1/2 bunch fresh parsley', '1/4 head cabbage', '100g macaroni', 'salt and pepper to taste']
